actions.name: Connect
actions.description: Grants permission to customer for connecting to Elastic Inference accelerator

actions.name: DescribeAcceleratorOfferings
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the locations in which a given accelerator type or set of types is present in a given region

actions.name: DescribeAcceleratorTypes
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the accelerator types available in a given region, as well as their characteristics, such as memory and throughput

actions.name: DescribeAccelerators
actions.description: Grants permission to describe information over a provided set of accelerators belonging to an account

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list all tags on an Amazon RDS resource

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to assign one or more tags (key-value pairs) to the specified QuickSight resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove a tag or tags from a resource
